import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Modal, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import colors from "../../config/colors"; import "./Modal.css"; function ModalComponent(props) { const [state, setState] = useState({ accountNo: "", fullName: "", emailId: "", balance: "", contactNo: "", accountType: "", branchName: "", createdAt: "", }); return ( Update User Profile
setState((prevState) => { return { ...prevState, emailId: event.target.value }; }) } className="input-field" />
); } export default ModalComponent;
